spec.description: Configuration affecting load balancing, outlier detection, etc. See more details at: https://istio.io/docs/reference/config/networking/destination-rule.html

exportTo.description: A list of namespaces to which this destination rule is exported.

host.description: The name of a service from the service registry.

trafficPolicy.description: Traffic policies that apply to this subset.

h2UpgradePolicy.description: Specify if http1.1 connection should be upgraded to http2 for the associated destination.

http1MaxPendingRequests.description: Maximum number of pending HTTP requests to a destination.

http2MaxRequests.description: Maximum number of requests to a backend.

idleTimeout.description: The idle timeout for upstream connection pool connections.

maxRequestsPerConnection.description: Maximum number of requests per connection to a backend.

useClientProtocol.description: If set to true, client protocol will be preserved while initiating connection to backend.

tcp.description: Settings common to both HTTP and TCP upstream connections.

maxConnections.description: Maximum number of HTTP1 /TCP connections to a destination host.

tcpKeepalive.description: If set then set SO_KEEPALIVE on the socket to enable TCP Keepalives.

interval.description: The time duration between keep-alive probes.

loadBalancer.description: Settings controlling the load balancer algorithms.

path.description: Path to set for the cookie.

httpHeaderName.description: Hash based on a specific HTTP header.

httpQueryParameterName.description: Hash based on a specific HTTP query parameter.

useSourceIp.description: Hash based on the source IP address.

distribute.description: Optional: only one of distribute, failover or failoverPriority can be set.

to.description: Map of upstream localities to traffic distribution weights.

enabled.description: enable locality load balancing, this is DestinationRule-level and will override mesh wide settings in entirety.

failover.description: Optional: only one of distribute, failover or failoverPriority can be set.

failoverPriority.description: failoverPriority is an ordered list of labels used to sort endpoints to do priority based load balancing.

consecutive5xxErrors.description: Number of 5xx errors before a host is ejected from the connection pool.

consecutiveGatewayErrors.description: Number of gateway errors before a host is ejected from the connection pool.

interval.description: Time interval between ejection sweep analysis.

splitExternalLocalOriginErrors.description: Determines whether to distinguish local origin failures from external errors.

portLevelSettings.description: Traffic policies specific to individual ports.
